ygData.subject: Re: Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya all, I thought I d start this post because it s good to see what other bards have got inventory wise so that I know what to aim for...... This is the
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya all,

I thought I'd start this post because it's good to see what other bards
have got inventory wise so that I know what to aim for......

This is the stuff my only character has, which I have earned myself...

Skull Shaped Barbute (+10 magic resist, +35 hp's)
Two +4 Str +2 int Earings
Plat Star Ruby Veil (+9Dex/Cha)
Golden Black Pearl Choker (+7 Dex/Agi)
BS Mantle (+3 Str +10 Magic resist)
Lambent BP, Arms, Legs, Boots, Gloves, one bracer.
Troll Hide Belt (+5 Str/Sta)
Two +3 Str/Dex rings
Two +5 Dex/+3 Str Bracers
Staff of Writhing aka Ugly Stick (DMG 9 DLY 33 -9 Cha) Effect: Chaotic
Feedback
Obsidian Scimitar (DMG 7 DLY 27 +6 Agi)
Dragoon Dirk in Range slot (+2 Dex/+3 Magic Resist)

Brass horn, Lute, flute and standard drums 8-(
A few bags and about 100pp in cash.

That's my lot, I look forward to seeing what everyone else has got.
